name: Unknown
line: Hello?

name: Unknown
line: Nancy?

name: Unknown
line: Nancy!

name: Unknown
line: Hello?

name: Unknown
line: Hey, what's the matter?

name: Unknown
line: Nothing.

name: Unknown
line: You're so beautiful.

name: Unknown
line: Steve?

name: Steve
line: Hey, Steve. I'll see you tomorrow, okay?

name: Unknown
line: Oh! Jesus, you scared me.

name: Unknown
line: Oh, I scared you? I know, I should have called.

name: Unknown
line: Where have you been? We agreed on 10:00.

name: Nancy
line: After the assembly, some people wanted to get something to eat. I didn't think it'd be a big deal.

name: Karen
line: You didn't think to call and let me know? With everything that's been going on?

name: Nancy
line: I didn't realize how late it was, okay? I'm sorry, Mom. What more do you want?

name: Karen
line: Hey, wait... Whose sweatshirt is that?

name: Nancy
line: Steve's.

name: Karen
line: Steve's. So is Steve your boyfriend now?

name: Nancy
line: What? No! It was just cold, so I borrowed his sweatshirt. It's not a big deal.

name: Karen
line: Nancy? You can talk to me. You can talk to me. Whatever happened.

name: Nancy
line: Nothing happened.

name: Karen
line: Nancy. Nothing happened. Can I please go?

name: Joyce
line: Will? Will? Sweetheart, can you hear me? Will... Please... Will... It's me. It's me. Just talk to me. Talk to me. Just say...

name: Will
line: Mom?

name: Jonathan
line: Jonathan?

name: Joyce
line: Come here. Come here. It's Will. It's Will, he's trying to talk to me.

name: Jonathan
line: He's trying to talk to you?

name: Joyce
line: Yes, through... through the lights.

name: Jonathan
line: Mom... It's the electricity, Mom. It's acting up.

name: Joyce
line: No. It's the same thing that fried the phone. No! It is not the electricity, Jonathan. Something is going on here! Yesterday, the wall...

name: Jonathan
line: What? What about the wall? Mom, first the lights, then the wall?

name: Joyce
line: I don't know. I don't know. I just know that Will is here.

name: Jonathan
line: No, Mom. You don't need more lamps. You need to stop this, okay? He is just lost. People are looking for him, and they're going to find him.

name: Joyce
line: Okay. Okay, okay. Okay, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

name: Jonathan
line: Can you do me a favor, Mom? Can you just try and get some sleep? Huh? Can you do that for me?

name: Joyce
line: I promise. I will.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah? I just need to sit here for a minute.

name: Joyce
line: Okay. Yeah?

name: Jonathan
line: All right, I'll go make breakfast.

name: Joyce
line: Will?

name: Mike
line: We just tell our parents we have AV Club after school. That'll give us at least a few hours for Operation Mirkwood.

name: Lucas
line: You seriously think that the weirdo knows where Will is?

name: Mike
line: Just trust me on this, okay?

name: Lucas
line: Okay.

name: Mike
line: Did you get the supplies?

name: Lucas
line: Yeah. Binoculars... from 'Nam. Army knife... also from 'Nam. Hammer, camouflage bandana... and the wrist rocket.

name: Dustin
line: You're gonna take out the Demogorgon with a slingshot?

name: Lucas
line: First of all, it's a wrist rocket. And second of all, the Demogorgon's not real. It's made up. But if there is something out there, I'm gonna shoot it in the eye... and blind it.

name: Dustin
line: Dustin, what did you get?

name: Dustin
line: Well, alrighty. So, we've got... Nutty Bars, Bazooka, Pez, Smarties, Pringles, Nilla Wafers, apple, banana, and trail mix.

name: Lucas
line: Seriously?

name: Dustin
line: We need energy for our travels. For stamina. And besides, why do we even need weapons anyway? We have her.

name: Lucas
line: She shut one door!

name: Dustin
line: With her mind! Are you kidding me? That's insane! Imagine all the other cool stuff she could do. Like... I bet... that she could make this fly!

name: Lucas
line: Hey. Hey. Okay, concentrate. Okay? Okay, one more time. Use your powers, okay?

name: Dustin
line: Idiot.

name: Mike
line: She's not a dog!

name: Karen
line: Boys! Time for school!

name: Mike
line: Just stay down here. Don't make any noise, and don't leave. If you get hungry, eat Dustin's snacks, okay?

name: Mike
line: You know those power lines?

name: Eleven
line: Power lines?

name: Mike
line: Yeah. The ones behind my house?

name: Eleven
line: Yes.

name: Mike
line: Meet us there, after school.

name: Eleven
line: After school?

name: Mike
line: Yeah, 3:15. When the numbers read three-one-five, meet us there.

name: Eleven
line: Three-one-five.

name: Mike
line: Three-one-five.

name: Steve
line: I had a good time.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah. Yeah. Me, too.

name: Nancy
line: Hey, Ally. Where's Barb?

name: Ally
line: Um, shouldn't you know?

name: Nancy
line: You haven't seen her anywhere... at all?

name: Powell
line: There she is. Emerald City.

name: Callahan
line: I heard they make space weapons in there.

name: Powell
line: Space weapons?

name: Callahan
line: Yeah. You know, like, Reagan's Star Wars. I guess we're gonna blow the Ruskies to smithereens.

name: Guard
line: Hey, can I help you?

name: Hopper
line: Uh, yeah. We're here for a tour.

name: Guard
line: Oh, we don't give tours.

name: Hopper
line: Okay... A quick look around.

name: Guard
line: You have to get clearance for that. You can contact, uh... Rick Schaeffer at the Department of Energy.

name: Hopper
line: Maybe you seen it on TV. We got a local kid that's missing. We have reason to believe he might have snuck in here.

name: Guard
line: Like I said, you have to speak to Mr. Schaeffer.

name: Hopper
line: What's your name?

name: Guard
line: Patrick.

name: Hopper
line: Patrick, I got a panicked mayor, and I got reporters breathing down my neck and I got a very upset mother. Now, I know the kid's not in there, but I gotta check off this box. Patrick, would you do me a favor? Would you speak to your boss and see what you can swing for us? I'd really appreciate it. I'm talking ten minutes, tops.

name: Ronald Reagan
line: ...was occupying a large part of Lebanon. Today, Syria has become a home for...

name: He-Man
line: I have the power!

name: Announcer
line: ...gift that will last forever. From the Harmony Treasures' collection...

name: Woman Singing
line: On the beach and in the sun The real thing is so much fun All the times of your life And the things that you do Coke is right there with you Coke is it! Coke is it!

name: Joyce
line: Joyce... Just ring me up, Donald.

name: Unknown
line: And you think this missing boy may have crawled through there?

name: Hopper
line: Well, that was the idea.

name: Unknown
line: Yeah, I just don't see how that'd be possible. We've got over 100 cameras. Every square inch covered, plus all my guys. No one breaks in here. Certainly not some kid.

name: Hopper
line: Those cameras, you keep the tapes?

name: Hopper
line: If you don't mind me asking, what do you guys do in here?

name: Unknown
line: You're asking the wrong guy. Staying one step ahead of the Russians? I expect. Something like that.

name: Hopper
line: Who's in charge here?

name: Unknown
line: That'd be Dr. Brenner.

name: Hopper
line: And he builds the space lasers?

name: Unknown
line: Space lasers?

name: Hopper
line: Ignore him.

name: Unknown
line: This is the night of the 6th and 7th we're seeing here?

name: Hopper
line: That's correct.

name: Hopper
line: Is that it?

name: Unknown
line: Like I said, we would have seen him.

name: Hopper
line: The night of the 7th, we had a search party out for Will. You remember anything about that night?

name: Unknown
line: Mmm, not much to remember. Called it off. 'Cause of the storm.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, a lot of rain that night. You see any rain on that tape?

name: Powell
line: What are you thinking?

name: Hopper
line: I don't know. But they're lying.

name: Tommy
line: That's why science doesn't make any damn sense to me.

name: Carol
line: No, I swear. Look at this. It's totally frostbite.

name: Unknown
line: Oh, thanks, man. It's a heated pool.

name: Tommy
line: Well, if it's not frostbite, then what is it?

name: Carol
line: Ugh, I don't care what it is, it's disgusting! Get it off the table. We're eating here.

name: Nancy
line: Hey, Tommy. When you left, did you see Barb?

name: Tommy
line: What? Barbara?

name: Nancy
line: She's not here today.

name: Tommy
line: I seriously have no idea who you're talking about.

name: Nancy
line: Come on, don't be an ass, man. Did you... Did you see her leave last night or not?

name: Tommy
line: No, she was gone when we left.

name: Carol
line: Probably couldn't stand listening to all that moaning.

name: Carol
line: Oh, Steve! Oh, Steve!

name: Tommy
line: Oh, Steve!

name: Steve
line: Okay, chill.

name: Nancy
line: Listen... I'm sure she's fine. She's probably just... she's probably just, like, skipping or something.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah. Yeah, probably.

name: Mike
line: How about this one?

name: Dustin
line: Too big for the sling.

name: Mike
line: So, do you think Eleven was born with her powers, like the X-Men, or do you think she acquired them, like... like Green Lantern?

name: Lucas
line: She's not a superhero. She's a weirdo.

name: Mike
line: Why does that matter? The X-Men are weirdos.

name: Lucas
line: If you love her so much, why don't you marry her?

name: Mike
line: What are you talking about?

name: Lucas
line: Mike, seriously? You look at her all, like... 'Hi, El! El! El! El! I love you so much! Would you marry me?'

name: Mike
line: Shut up, Lucas.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, shut up, Lucas.

name: Troy
line: What are you losers doing back here?

name: Unknown
line: Probably looking for their missing friend.

name: Dustin
line: That's not funny. It's serious. He's in danger.

name: Troy
line: I hate to break it to you, Toothless, but he's not in danger. He's dead. That's what my dad says. He said he was probably killed by some other queer.

name: Mike
line: Come on. Just ignore them.

name: Unknown
line: Watch where you're going, Frogface.

name: Mike
line: You all right?

name: Dustin
line: Yeah.

name: Mike
line: How about this one?

name: Dustin
line: Yeah. Yeah, this is it.

name: Mike
line: Oh, yeah. Yeah, this is the monster killer!

name: Karen
line: Hey! Hey, Karen. I brought you a casserole.

name: Joyce
line: Oh! Thank you, uh... Uh, you wanna... come in?

name: Hopper
line: Hey, Marissa. How you doin'?

name: Marissa
line: You have a lot of nerve showing up here.

name: Hopper
line: What?

name: Marissa
line: You could have at least called, said, 'Marissa! Hey, it's not gonna work out. Sorry I wasted your time. I'm a dick.'

name: Hopper
line: Yep. I'm sorry. Uh... Maybe we could go out again next week?

name: Hopper
line: Newspapers? You guys got newspapers around here?

name: Marissa
line: We have the New York Times, the Post, all the big ones. Organized by year and topic. You can find the corresponding microfiche in the reading room.

name: Hopper
line: Okay, we're looking for anything on the Hawkins National Laboratory.

name: Marissa
line: Well, shouldn't you be looking for that missing kid?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah. We are. Uh, so, why don't you start with the Times, and we'll check out the Post.

name: Callahan
line: The librarian?

name: Joyce
line: Will always loved Christmas, you know. So I thought if I... I put the lights up... I don't know, he... I'd feel like he was home somehow. It's silly, I know.

name: Karen
line: No. No, it's not silly.

name: Karen
line: How is Jonathan holding up?

name: Joyce
line: You know, he's good at taking care of himself. He always has been, you know? I mean, he thinks I'm losing my mind, but...

name: Karen
line: Is something the matter?

name: Joyce
line: Uh, no. No, I just... We're having electrical problems.

name: Karen
line: Joyce. I want you to know something. If you need anything, anything at all... Ted and I are here for you.

name: Joyce
line: Thank you. Thanks.

name: Joyce
line: How... how's Mike dealing with this? Is he, uh, okay?

name: Karen
line: Mike? Uh... I don't know. He skipped school yesterday. He's never done anything like that before.

name: Joyce
line: Hey! She shouldn't be here.

name: Karen
line: Oh, I'm sorry. She's quite the explorer these days.

name: Holly
line: Yeah.

name: Joyce
line: Wait, did you see something? What did... what did you see? Tell me. What did you see? What...

name: Karen
line: Joyce... Joyce! Listen... Karen, thank you for the casserole, but I need you to leave. Okay?

name: Nancy
line: Hello? Hi. Hi, uh, Ms. Holland, it's Nancy.

name: Ms. Holland
line: Oh, Nancy, how are you?

name: Nancy
line: Good. I'm good. Um, I was just wondering, uh, is Barb there?

name: Ms. Holland
line: Mmm... No, she hasn't come home yet.

name: Nancy
line: But she did come home, right? After the vigil?

name: Ms. Holland
line: No, she said she was staying with you last night.

name: Nancy
line: Right, yes. She did, sorry. I meant, did she come home this morning? I think she left some textbooks and she was gonna go pick them up.

name: Ms. Holland
line: Oh, um, no, I haven't seen her.

name: Nancy
line: Do... Do you know what? I just remembered... she's at the library.

name: Ms. Holland
line: Nancy, will you please have her call me as soon as you find her?

name: Nancy
line: Yeah. Yeah, I will. Sorry to bother you.

name: Steve
line: Nicole here was, uh, telling us about your work.

name: Carol
line: We've heard great things.

name: Tommy
line: Yeah, sounds cool.

name: Steve
line: And we'd just love to take a look. You know, as... connoisseurs of art.

name: Jonathan
line: I don't know what you're talking about.

name: Steve
line: Oh, no? Oh... Please, give me my bag. No, just...

name: Tommy
line: Man, he is totally trembling. He must really have something to hide.

name: Steve
line: Here we go. Ah... Here we go.

name: Tommy
line: Let me see.

name: Steve
line: Yeah, this isn't creepy at all.

name: Jonathan
line: I was looking for my brother.

name: Steve
line: No. No, this is called stalking. Mmm-hmm.

name: Nancy
line: What's going on?

name: Tommy
line: Here's the starring lady.

name: Nancy
line: What?

name: Tommy
line: This creep was spying on us last night.

name: Steve
line: He was probably gonna save this one for later.

name: Steve
line: See, you can tell that he knows it was wrong, but... Man, that's the thing about perverts... It's hardwired into 'em. You know, they just can't help themselves. So... we'll just have to take away his toy.

name: Nancy
line: Steve...

name: Jonathan
line: No, please, not the camera.

name: Steve
line: No, no, wait, wait... Tommy, Tommy. It's okay. Here you go, man.

name: Steve
line: Come on, let's go. The game's about to start.

name: Carol
line: Bye.

name: Steve
line: Hey, Nance! Come on.

name: Eleven
line: Three-one-five. Three-one-five. Three-one-five.

name: Unknown
line: Incredible.

name: Mike
line: El! You okay?

name: Mike
line: Hop on. We only have a few hours.

name: Tommy
line: So, I told Mr. Mundy... 'The solution of ten plus Y equals... blow me.'

name: Steve
line: Bull, if you did that, you'd be in detention right now.

name: Tommy
line: Saturday.

name: Tommy
line: I bet Mr. Mundy's still a virgin.

name: Carol
line: Oh, he's so a virgin!

name: Tommy
line: Maybe you should blow him, Carol. Help your grades a bit.

name: Steve
line: Whoa, Nance, where you going?

name: Nancy
line: I totally forgot. I told my mom I would, um... I would do something with her.

name: Steve
line: Well, what do you mean? The game's about to start.

name: Nancy
line: I'm sorry.

name: Tommy
line: What the hell's wrong with her?

name: Steve
line: Maybe she freaked out when you went all psycho on the psycho.

name: Tommy
line: Oh, give me a break.

name: Carol
line: What'd you expect, dating Miss Perfect?

name: Mike
line: Why did they hurt you?

name: Eleven
line: What?

name: Mike
line: Oh, that. Uh... I just fell at recess.

name: Eleven
line: Mike...

name: Mike
line: Yeah?

name: Eleven
line: Friends tell the truth.

name: Mike
line: I was tripped by this mouth breather, Troy, okay?

name: Eleven
line: Mouth breather?

name: Mike
line: Yeah, you know... a dumb person. A knucklehead.

name: Eleven
line: Knucklehead?

name: Mike
line: I don't know why I just didn't tell you. Everyone at school knows. I just didn't want you to think I was such a wastoid, you know?

name: Eleven
line: Mike...

name: Mike
line: Yeah?

name: Eleven
line: I understand.

name: Mike
line: Oh. Okay, cool.

name: Eleven
line: Cool.

name: Nancy
line: Barb? Barb! Barb? Barb?

name: Joyce
line: Will... are you here? Okay, good, good, good, good. Are you... Um, blink once for yes, twice for no. Can you do that for me, sweetie? Can you do... Good boy. Good boy. Baby, I need to know... Are you alive?

name: Joyce
line: Are you safe?

name: Joyce
line: I need to know where to find you, honey. Where... where are you? Can you... can you tell me where you are? Please, baby. I need to find you. Tell me what to do. Please just... Will...

name: Karen
line: Hey! You're home early! How was the game?

name: Karen
line: Nancy? What's the matter?

name: Nancy
line: It's Barb. I think... something happened. Something terrible.

name: Powell
line: I don't know, Chief.

name: Hopper
line: What don't you know?

name: Powell
line: This lady, Terry Ives, sounds like a real nut to me. Her kid was taken for LSD mind control experiments? She's been discredited. Claim was thrown out...

name: Hopper
line: Okay, forget about her. Take a look at this.

name: Powell
line: Dr. Martin Brenner.

name: Hopper
line: Who?

name: Powell
line: Brenner.

name: Hopper
line: He runs Hawkins Lab.

name: Powell
line: Okay.

name: Hopper
line: You don't find that interesting?

name: Powell
line: Not really. He was involved in some hippie crap back in the day, so what?

name: Hopper
line: No, this isn't hippie crap. This is CIA-sanctioned research.

name: Powell
line: Doesn't mean he had anything to do with our kid.

name: Hopper
line: Come on. Look at that. Hospital gowns. All of 'em. Now, that piece of fabric that the teacher found by the pipe. That sure looked like a hospital gown to me, huh? Am I wrong?

name: Powell
line: I don't know, Chief.

name: Hopper
line: Come on, man. Work with me here. I'm not saying that there's some grand conspiracy. I'm just... Maybe something happened. Maybe Will was in the wrong place at the wrong time and he saw something that he shouldn't have.

name: Powell
line: It's a reach.

name: Hopper
line: It's a start.

name: Callahan
line: Hey, Powell, is the chief with you?

name: Hopper
line: Hopper here. What do you got?

name: Eleven
line: Here.

name: Mike
line: Yeah, this is where Will lives.

name: Eleven
line: Hiding.

name: Mike
line: No, no, this is where he lives. He's missing from here. Understand?

name: Lucas
line: What are we doing here?

name: Mike
line: She said he's hiding here.

name: Lucas
line: Um... no!

name: Dustin
line: I swear, if we walked all the way out here for nothing...

name: Lucas
line: That's exactly what we did. I told you she didn't know what the hell she was talking about!

name: Mike
line: Why did you bring us here?

name: Lucas
line: Mike, don't waste your time with her.

name: Mike
line: What do you want to do then?

name: Lucas
line: Call the cops, like we should have done yesterday.

name: Mike
line: We are not calling the cops!

name: Dustin
line: Hey, guys? What other choice do we have? Guys!

name: Mike
line: Will...

name: Joyce
line: Okay. Okay, baby, talk to me. Talk to me. Where are you?

name: Joyce
line: 'R.' Good, good, good, good. That's good. Come on, come on. 'I... G... H... T... H... E... R... E...' 'Right here.' 'Right here'? I don't know what that means. I need you to tell me what to do. How do I get to you? How do I find you? What should I do?

name: Hopper
line: Oh, Jesus.

name: Hopper
line: Oh, God. Please tell me it's not the kid.

name: Mike
line: It's not Will. It can't be.

name: Lucas
line: It's Will. It's really Will.

name: Eleven
line: Mike...

name: Mike
line: 'Mike'? 'Mike,' what? You were supposed to help us find him alive. You said he was alive! Why did you lie to us? What's wrong with you? What is wrong with you?

name: Eleven
line: Mike...

name: Dustin
line: Mike, come on. Don't do this, man.

name: Lucas
line: Mike... Mike, where are you going? Mike!

name: Lucas
line: Mike!

name: Jonathan
line: Mom? Mom, what happened?

name: Jonathan
line: It's okay.

name: Karen
line: Michael? What's wrong?
